department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Provide a complete single-sided and portable, magnetic resonance probe and spectrometer system equipped with a permanent magnet
description: Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide the Department of National Defence (DND), more specifically the  and Chemical Engineering Department of the Royal Military  of Canada, with a complete single-sided and portable, magnetic resonance probe and spectrometer system equipped with a permanent magnet.
